Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Donald Trump was accused of racism before he ran for president in 2016.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that Donald Trump was never accused of racism before 2016, when there is evidence of such accusations.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it ignores the documented instances of Donald Trump being accused of racism before his presidential campaign.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that accusations of racism against Donald Trump only started when he ran for president, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that Donald Trump has been accused of racism before 2016, based on documented incidents.
